text:
It seems like this will be important history not to let get rewritten: McCain didn’t vote against “repeal and replace.” He voted against repeal because there was no replace. 

The plan Trump promised in the campaign to get affordable health care for everyone didn’t exist.

text:
I find the trick to stop procrastinating is to commit to something else that's even more daunting. Then I procrastinate on that by doing the initial thing. 

And then to get the new thing done, I guess commit to something even worse. Repeat until probably some kind of breakdown.
author: jameshamblin
